channel.title: rando on neilpa.me
channel.description: Recent content in rando on neilpa.me

item.title: Un-distracted?
item.description: It’s been almost four years since setting up this blog and it’s still empty. I’m sure living up to that “easily distracted” tagline. I plan to change this and actually make use of this space. I’ve got a decent backlog of material in various stages of complete. Hopefully some of it will make for good blog fodder. Assuming I can clean it up for publishing before getting distracted by some new shiny problem.

item.title: Hello, world!
item.description: This is my blog. There are many like it, but this one is mine.
